name: LAST LIGHT (joshcamas)
description:
The world has ended, with you as the final protector for the last light. Collect embers, construct defenses, and survive as long as you can.

Project made in 2 weeks by Joshua Steinhauer and Jarrid Kamphenkel

Controls:
- WASD: Move
- Left Click: Shoot / Place Object
- Right Click: Rotate Object
- E: Toggle Shop
- R: Switch Weapons
